articles.description: A homecoming celebration for the Lionesses in central London will start with an open-top bus procession along The Mall.

articles.description: World Rugby boss Alan Gilpin rejects Australia coach Joe Schmidt's claim that the decision around Jac Morgan's clearout at the end of the second Test against the British and Irish Lions contravened the sport's player welfare drive.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: World Rugby boss rejects Joe Schmidt's clearout complaints

articles.description: From Bihar to Birmingham, Akash Deep has come from humble beginnings and overcome family tragedy to make his mark in the India Test side.
articles.title: Akash Deep: India seamer's journey to Test glory

articles.description: Newcastle have not yet received a bid for their top scorer Alexander Isak, says manager Eddie Howe.
articles.title: Alexander Isak: Newcastle not yet received bid for striker, says boss Eddie Howe

articles.description: The next chapter in one of football's most confusing careers is nearly upon us - but will Joao Felix ever fulfil his potential?
articles.title: Joao Felix: Chelsea forward set to join Al-Nassr - so what next?

articles.description: Australia complete a comprehensive 5-0 clean sweep against West Indies in their T20 series by winning the final match of their tour by three wickets.
articles.title: Australia compound West Indies misery with 5-0 win in T20 series

articles.title: F1 Q&A: Lewis Hamilton form, Red Bull engine in 2026 and safety at Belgium Grand Prix

articles.description: British number one Emma Raducanu continues her fine form in North America with a routine win against Elena-Gabriela Ruse at the Canadian Open.
